code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTask=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[text,setText]=useState("");const[day,setDay]=useState("");const[reminder,setReminder]=useState(false);const onSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!text){alert("Please add a task");return;}onAdd({text,day,reminder});setText("");setDay("");setReminder(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"add-form",onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add Task",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Day & Time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add Day & Time",value:day,onChange:e=>setDay(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-control form-control-check",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Set Reminder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:reminder,value:reminder,onChange:e=>setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Save Task",className:"btn btn-block"})]});};export default AddTask;
